name: P.E.S.T - Protocol: Exterminate System Threats
description:
Defend your PC from an infestation of bugs

Features:

  • Online multiplayer 2 players
    • Local network only
  • Day and Night cycle
  • Protect the system core from enemies
  • Explore the cold and hard environment in the interior of a PC

The system core is under attack.
Waves of bugs and vira are trying to shutdown the system!
Explore the system to find secrets and new weapons.
Restart the system after a breakdown,
but doing so will alert the horde! Growing stronger for each cycle.
